    • dateFormater

      static java.text.SimpleDateFormat dateFormater

  • Constructor Details

    • RequestHandler

      public RequestHandler()
      Create a new file to store all new requests. Load all the existing requests if the file already exists.

  • Method Details

    • addRequest

      public void addRequest​(java.util.Date startTime, int playersCount, int forPlayground, java.lang.String bookingCreator)
      Creates a new request and set it's attributes
      Parameters:
      startTime - The desired date to book
      playersCount - The number of players that are going to play
      forPlayground - the playground to be booked
      bookingCreator - the creator of the request name

    • acceptRequest

      public void acceptRequest​(int id)
      Accept a booking request
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the request

    • showRequestsByPlayground

      public void showRequestsByPlayground​(int ID)
      Display all the requests for a certain playground
      Parameters:
      ID - The playground id

    • showRequestsByPlayer

      public void showRequestsByPlayer​(java.lang.String name)
      Display all the requests from a player
      Parameters:
      name - the player name

    • readRequestsFile

      public static void readRequestsFile()
      Load all the existing requests

    • writeRequestsFile

      public static void writeRequestsFile()
      Update the Requests database
